ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: that his striving will most certainly be seen;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That his endeavours will be judged,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and that (the result of) his striving shall soon be seen,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He will certainly see the result of his labor
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And that his effort will soon be scrutinised?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And that his deeds will be seen.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And that his striving shall soon be seen-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and that his labouring shall surely be seen,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And that his effort will be seen.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and that [the fruit of] his striving shall soon be seen;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And that his endeavour shall be presently observed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and that he will soon be shown his endeavour,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That (the fruit of) his striving will soon come in sight:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And that his deeds will be seen,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and that his work is surely seen
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And that his efforts will be witnessed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And that his effort is going to be seen -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:40] and that his endeavour will be seen, it will be inspected in the Hereafter,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And that his effort will be seen) and that his works will be seen,
